key_quotes:
[POSITIVE] We delivered strong results with revenue of $56.5 billion,
                up 13% year over year, and operating income of $26.9 billion, up 25%.

[POSITIVE] We're seeing healthy trends in both new customer acquisition
                and existing customer expansion.

[POSITIVE] We remain confident in our long-term
                growth trajectory and are raising our full-year guidance across all segments.
